about_the_game:
As you decide to go for a relaxing stroll to the waterfall, all of the sudden someone from another world appears right in front of you! It's none other than Nitori Kawashiro from the Touhou Project!

"Fiances, Friends and Failures. You give me that packet of cucumbers and I can give you a detailed rundown on a topic pertaining to any of those aspects."


Featuring immersive sounds and atmospheric scenes, Nitori will give you insight on some of the most relevant topics in life, not bad for a pack of cucumbers, right?

Note: This DLC currently does not work with the Chinese or Spanish translations, to play the base game in Chinese or Spanish, you will have to disable the DLC and re-select your desired language from the language tab in the base game's property settings.
detailed_description:
As you decide to go for a relaxing stroll to the waterfall, all of the sudden someone from another world appears right in front of you! It's none other than Nitori Kawashiro from the Touhou Project!

"Fiances, Friends and Failures. You give me that packet of cucumbers and I can give you a detailed rundown on a topic pertaining to any of those aspects."


Featuring immersive sounds and atmospheric scenes, Nitori will give you insight on some of the most relevant topics in life, not bad for a pack of cucumbers, right?

Note: This DLC currently does not work with the Chinese or Spanish translations, to play the base game in Chinese or Spanish, you will have to disable the DLC and re-select your desired language from the language tab in the base game's property settings.

short_description: Nitori Kawashiro from the Touhou Project has a thing or two to say about certain aspects of life, but it'll cost you! A pack of cucumbers to be precise! With immersive sounds and scenes coupled with the wits of our clever Kappa, you're sure to enjoy it!
